title: URF ALL THE TIME!!!!:)
body: Im not sure if the rest of you will agree with me, but I really wish they would have an **URF** mode all the time other than April. The game mode is so fun itself I really wanna play it all the time. As a suggestion, I really think Riot should have many more _permanent_ game modes. But I still don't want to ruin the excitement of temporary game mode events such as **URF** and the new **ARAM** one! A really good idea would be to make a propper **Hide 'n' Seek **mode!:) {{summoner:31}}
